title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sab se apni kala yatra ke baare mein kuch baatein batana chahti hoon.

Anushka: Yaar, bachpan mein toh bas rangon se khelna pasand tha. School ki deewaron par bhi drawing bana deti thi, maa daantati thi!

Anushka: Lekin, dheere-dheere samajh aaya ki yeh sirf khel nahi, kuch aur bhi hai. Kuchh kahaniyan hain jo mein rangon se kehna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Phir college mein painting classes join kiye. Naye techniques sikhe, naye logon se mili. Bohut maza aaya!

Anushka: Kayi baar laga ki yeh mushkil hai, shayad main nahi kar paungi. Par fir socha, "Anushka, try toh kar!"

Anushka: Aur woh "try" aaj bhi jaari hai. Har painting ek naya safar hai. Ek nayi kahani hai.

Anushka: Meri art journey abhi shuru hui hai, aur main excited hoon ki yeh mujhe kahaan le jaati hai. Thank you!
